summary: A child who lived alone with wolves for 12 years.
cast: Juan José Ballesta|Sancho Gracia|Manuel Camacho|Carlos Bardem|Alex Brendemühl|Eduardo Gómez|Agustín Rodríguez López|Luisa Martín|Vicente Romero|Dafne Fernández|José Chaves|Francisco Conde|José Manuel Soto|Félix Sancho|Antonio Dechent|Marcos Rodríguez Pantoja
title: Entrelobos
